title: Antietam National Battlefield: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Antietam National Cemetery, dedicated September 1867            Piper Barn    Park News Antietam National Battlefield news releases.          Downtown Sharpsburg, September 1862   Photos and Multimedia Check out our numerous photo galleries and short movies.          Living Historians at the Memorial Illumination Sharon Murray  History and Culture Learn about the people, places, stories, and collections of Antietam.            Nature Animals, plants, and many other natural features are all part of the Antietam National Battlefield.          Burnside Bridge over the Antietam Creek   Education Are you looking for information about planning a field trip or to get curriculum for the classroom? Visit our Education section.           Kids and Youth Junior Ranger program, scout activities, and many other activities can be found here.           Management Visit our management page for information on laws and policies and possible job opportunities at Antietam.
